entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
